name: SWAT City ATTACK Monster
description:
SWAT City ATTACK Monster!A brave jetpack soldier flies in a cemetery and fights zombies and creatures in this apocalyptic, humans versus monsters warfare. See how far you can fly to shoot all the monsters. Stay alive as long as you can to aim for high score.
On you goes crowd of zombies.
Use your weapon to kill zombies.
Touch on screen to aim and shoot.
